education.description: Do you want to develop future secure and sustainable IT solutions? It's difficult to imagine everyday life without the use of apps and digital solutions. How these systems are made and developed affects sustainability elements such as power consumption, lifespan and efficiency. Society is already significantly digitized, and the process continues at an ever-increasing pace. The Data Engineering program gives you practical competence in programming, where you learn to build sustainable IT systems and services. IT systems must be developed continuously in collaboration with customers and users. High demands are placed on user-friendliness, security, privacy and climate footprint. As a data engineer, you are well suited to solve these problems.
